ygData.subject: A good deal?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, last night was a very good night for me... I think. I finally got the Grobb Cleaver! I have been seeing someone auction Grobb Cleaver for sale give
ygData.messageBody:
Well, last night was a very good night for me... I think.
I finally got the Grobb Cleaver!
I have been seeing someone auction "Grobb Cleaver for
sale give tell." for the last couple of days. I have
been wishing like crazy that I could afford it, but when
asked the person wanted 125PP for it. I had only 10PP on
me at that time.
Fighting Dervs and desert undead has been more
profitable than I thought. I saw this person yell for a
SoW to get his corpse, so I gave him a tell and he said
it was still for sale and he wanted 85PP for it! Hot
damn! I had 40 PP in the bank, my FS2HS, a FS
Warhammer, and a Skull of Jhen'Tra to trade for it. The
Skull was a gift from my wife and cost her 12PP.
Now at At least 15-20PP for the 2HS, and 10-15PP for the
Warhammer and at cost of 12PP for the Skull, was this a
good deal? I have seen auctions for FS2HS that the
owner wanted 25PP for it. I have no idea really what
either the FS2HS or Warhammer is worth.
The sword was a gift and the hammer ws part of a trade
with some banded, money, rusty weapons, a box, a
lightstone and some more junk for my bronze pants. The
pants I got from a really kewl guy for 5PP! (Heh, they
were weighing him down and needed to get rid of them. I
was 8th level and that was all I had on me.)
Anyway, what would you have paid for the Grobb Cleaver?
Did I get a good deal?
I think I did IMHO which is all that really counts, but
I still would like to hear thoughts from all of you.
Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
14th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
